headline: Is Dow's (DOW) Consistent Dividend a Signal of Strength or Strategic Caution Amid Trade Uncertainty?
summary: Dow has declared a quarterly dividend of 35 cents per share, payable on December 12, 2025, to shareholders of record as of November 28, marking its 457th consecutive dividend since 1912. This ongoing commitment to dividends stands out as a signal of stability even as global trade uncertainties continue to shape investor sentiment. We'll examine how Dow's steadfast dividend policy amid escalating US-China tariff tensions influences its investment narrative and future outlook. These 10...
